bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with feng bi 風秘 . Pu ji fang 普濟方 295: 能消丸治五痔腫痛，下血不止，或 營衛滯澀，身體疼痛，大便風閉不通 , “The ‘pills able to dissolve’ cure the five types of piles with swelling and pain, unending discharge of blood, with in some cases the camp and guardian [qi] being sluggish and rough, the entire body being in pain, and defecation failing to pass because of wind closure ”.
